21.title: Volcano Go Boom!
21.plot: JP is super excited to show his tropical island diorama - complete with its very own working volcano. But when JP pushes the eruption button, nothing happens. Turns out Volcano is a little nervous about erupting and doesn't think she'll be able to do it. YOU and JP try everything to help Volcano out; YOU try making her laugh, YOU try giving her a push, YOU even try stomping like giant dinosaurs but nothing seems to be working. YOU and JP decide that maybe what Volcano needs to erupt is to believe in her herself. Then she'll be able to go boom.

22.title: Pretzel Pirates
22.plot: JP is finishing his bag of pretzels when he discovers Captain Saltypuss - the Pretzel Pirate. He welcomes YOU and JP as part of his crew as long as YOU follow the pirate rule - 'always do what the captain say'. YOU and JP are happy to do what the Captain says, until YOU realize that what the Captain says isn't always so nice. Captain Saltypuss even steals one of Chucks mittens. YOU and JP have to figure out how to change Captain Saltypuss into a nice pirate. Maybe he could be part of YOUR crew, which would obviously be the nicest and kindest crew in all of Sparkside.

23.title: Get That Bird Out of My Beard
23.plot: YOU and the Magic Fairy convince JP to try something new and wish for a lumberjack beard. As if JP in a lumberjack beard isn't silly enough, he discovers that there is a tiny bird hiding inside it. YOU and JP try a few things to lure the bird out of the beard but it turns out the bird is afraid to come out because he's never seen Sparkside and he doesn't know how to fly. YOU and JP show the bird that trying new things can be fun - just like JP's new beard (which by the way, might make an excellent bird nest after a shave).

24.title: You, Me and a Monster of the Sea
24.plot: YOU and JP are going on an adventure to find the long lost Monster of the Sea. Along for the ride is a boat rope who has never been to sea and is very grateful for the chance to come along. YOU and JP heave and ho YOUR way through the sea until YOU come across a floating bottle containing the secret to finding the Monster of the Sea - and it works. It's a good thing YOU've gathered these friends on the adventure because YOU and JP will need their help to get back to land when YOU discover there is a hole in the boat.

27.title: Moon Games
27.plot: JP is planning a trip to the moon and of course YOU agree to go along, especially since he's bringing along his bowling set, his kite and his badminton set to play with. Off YOU go in the spaceship, dodging asteroids along the way to the Moon. Upon arrival YOU find it might not be as easy to play and have fun as YOU thought - JP's toys keep floating away. Even YOUR bouncy new moon friend, Moonie can only keep the toys around for so long. That's okay though, YOU and JP learn that YOU can have tonnes of fun without toys. In fact, YOU already had been - ever since YOU ...

29.title: Finding Captain Awesome
29.plot: Captain Awesome is the greatest super hero in the whole universe and he has all the super powers imaginable. All he has to do is hold up his ring and say the power he needs and then PA-POW he has all the super power he needs to keep the universe safe. When Chuck finds Captain Awesome's ring in Sparkside, it's up to YOU and JP to find the super hero and give him back his ring. Along the way, YOU decide to use the ring to get flying power, freezing power and x-ray vision power. When YOU finally reach Captain Awesome's Secret Base to return the ring, YOU and JP discover ...

30.title: A Ghostly Neighbour
30.plot: JP is drawing a ghost for YOU when it suddenly pops off the page and starts making scary, silly ghost sounds. JP is pretty scared but YOU can see that the ghost actually looks kind of friendly and not scary at all. JP would know that too if he could see him, but he keeps missing the ghost when YOU point him out. When YOU and JP piece together that the ghost has been secretly helping the two of YOU all day, JP wonders if YOU should ask the ghost to become a friend. YOU agree of course - YOU knew the ghost was friendly all along.

31.title: Dinosaur Trackers
31.plot: JP is excited to show YOU his new dinosaur lunch box but before he can point it out, YOU notice that the dinosaur is missing. YOU agree to help JP track the missing Lunchboxasaurus, who luckily stepped in grape jam and left a sticky trail of footprints behind. The tracks lead to the mailbox, then to Betty's store and finally to Pocket Park. Once YOU find the Lunchboxasuarus YOU discover he's a little bit shy and doesn't want to live on a lunchbox. That's okay , YOU and JP understand and YOU're even able to come up with a way to replace the missing dinosaur on JP's ...

34.title: JP the Frog
34.plot: JP and Betty are going to read the story of the Frog Prince by the wishing pond in Pocket Park. Just as he's beginning to tell YOU how much he loves frogs, a pesky bug comes over and JP swats it away. But oh no. that bug wasn't a bug - it was Fairy. Fairy is a little upset at JP for being swatted so she turns him into a frog. After trying to gain control of his new found hoppiness and long sticky tongue, JP soon finds out that being a frog isn't as easy or frogtastico as he thought. He's going to need YOUR help to find out how to break this froggy spell.

imdb.title: You & Me
plot: You and Me is a return to classic children's television inviting preschoolers to take part in the ultimate play date, all set in a place where people, puppets and animation coexist in perfect harmony.::CBC Website
